Andy Coulson one degree of separation to the McCann affair: McCann family spokesman Clarence Mitchell joins CCHQ as head of media monitoring for the election www.prweek.com PR Week has the story: The Conservative Party has signed up Clarence Mitchell , best-known as spokesman for Madeleine McCann's parents, as the head of media monitoring for its general election campaign, PRWeek can exclusively reveal. " Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to Art Director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the Art Director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. officer as of April 4, handing the reins to Google co-founder Larry Page, who will become the central figure in day-to-day operations. Mr. Eric Schmidt will take the title of executive chairman, which entails a focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. Perhaps the most important aspect of Mr. Eric Schmidt 's new job will be keeping government bodies at bay, as Google's dominance attracts more attention from regulatory authorities. Going forward, Eric Schmidt will still have an influential role in the company in terms of continuing relationships in political circles and other external issues says Google. We do not view Eric Schmidt 's new role as executive chairman and Page's new role as chief executive as negative developments. In our view, Eric Schmidt very effectively spearheaded Google to become one of the largest and most innovative technology companies of our times and we expect Page to be an equally effective CEO of Google, wrote Sandeep Aggarwal, Internet analyst at Caris& Company. after the company's 2009 bankruptcy.Chrysler sold 1.52 million cars in 2010, helping it to boost its market share in the vital domestic US market to 9.2 per cent, from 8.8 per cent the year before. NFL vice president Brian McCarthy said Michael Vick has been diligent in tending to community-relations commitments as part of commissioner Roger Goodell 's program of rehabilitation for him following his incarceration for federal dogfighting offenses. He's done a great job turning things around, Brian McCarthy said. "He still meets regularly with the commissioner and fulfills his obligations." Michael Vick also continues to have conversations with former Colts coach Tony Dungy , who was assigned to mentor him.

for the invasion of Iraq in a famous session of the UN Security Council and then, in Donald Rumsfeld 's words, claiming that he was "somehow innocently misled into making a false declaration." Rumseld writes: Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody, nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie. The Congress did not lie. The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Donald Rumsfeld , in his book, is particularly galled that Colin Powell issued an apology for the looting of Baghdad's Iraqi National Museum and vowed to recover stolen artifacts.
